chat.autofish.welcome: AutoFish is {0}.  Type ''{1}'' while holding a fishing rod for more options
chat.autofish.timeout: We should have caught something by now.  Re-casting.
chat.autofish.hookedentity: Oops, we hooked an Entity.  Re-casting.
chat.autofish.notinwater: Hook should be in water but isn''t.  Re-casting.
gui.autofish.config.title: AutoFish Forge Mod Options
gui.autofish.config.enabled.description: Automatically reel in and re-cast when a fish nibbles the hook. If set to false, all other AutoFish functionality is disabled.
gui.autofish.config.multirod.description: Automatically switch to a new fishing rod when the current rod breaks, if one is available in the hotbar.
gui.autofish.config.preventbreak.descrip: Stop fishing or switch to a new rod just before the current rod breaks.  Useful if you want to repair your enchanted fishing rods.
gui.autofish.config.recastdelay.descript: Time (in seconds) to wait before automatically re-casting. Increase this value if server lag causes re-casting to fail.
gui.autofish.config.entityclearprotect.d: When playing on a server, re-cast after the server clears entities.  Useful if you are playing on a server that periodically deletes all entities (including fishing hooks) from the world, which causes you to stop fishing.
gui.autofish.config.aggressive.descripti: When playing on a server, be more aggressive about detecting fish bites.  Improves multiplayer bite detection from ~85% to ~95%, but false positives will be more likely, especially if other players are fishing very close by.
gui.autofish.config.handleproblems.descr: [HAS SIDE EFFECTS] Re-cast when problems detected (e.g. if not in water or if a MOB has been hooked).  If enabled, non-fishing use of the fishing rod (e.g. intentionally hooking MOBs) will be affected.
gui.autofish.config.fastfishing.descript: [SINGLE PLAYER ONLY] Fish will bite right after casting.
